title: Kerala: Elephant falls into water-filled pit, gets rescued by forest staff after several hours
content: #WATCH | Kerala | On rescue of a wild elephant in Kottappady, Range officer Kodanad, Geo Basil Paul says, "Initially, we were trying to tranquillize the elephant but due to water and rain we could not do so.  After the rescue, we moved the elephant to the forest area." pic.twitter.com/uoDbrGVRbbâ€” ANI (@ANI) April 12, 2024
author: Scroll Staff
